{"id":1273085109,"question_id":50,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week, 5 days","timestamp":1717141577,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1273085109/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public double myPow(double x, int n) {\n\n        if(n==0) return 1;\n        if(n==1) return x;\n\n\n        if(n<0){\n            n=-n;\n            x = 1/x;\n        }\n\n        // n == -2147483648 多做一次\n        if(n==Integer.MIN_VALUE){ \n            x = x*x;\n            n =n/2;   \n        }\n\n       \n\n\n        if(n%2==0){\n            return myPow(x*x, n/2);\n        }else{\n            return x * myPow( x*x ,n/2);\n        }\n\n\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
